New York University Archives Audiovisual Collection
Highlights in Jazz #16: The Jazz/Latin Jam - Ray Barretto, Ray Bryant, Jon Faddis, Joe Farrell, Joe Beck, Herb Bushler, Jimmy Madison, Mel Lewis, Andrea Brachfeld (Tape 3 of 3)
Highlights in Jazz #16: The Jazz/Latin Jam - Ray Barretto, Ray Bryant, Jon Faddis, Joe Farrell, Joe Beck, Herb Bushler, Jimmy Madison, Mel Lewis, Andrea Brachfeld (Tape 3 of 3)
This recording is labeled Tape 3 of 3. The University Archives does not have Tapes 1 or 2.

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "This tape contains only about 6 minutes of content. As with other tapes in this collection, there is an inherent, constant sync error that is stabilized by time base correction, but ultimately results in moderate to severe flagging throughout. This flagging is generally above the performers, but intensifies on tighter shots. Mild image jitter throughout. Elsewhere, there are occasional mild dropouts and tape wear, and one instance of tape damage. Occasional mild ghosting. Luma is adjusted to mitigate clipping from glare. Audio distortion is inherent to the original recording."
